name: Proof_349 — Morning Temperature & Humidity Before Work MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents the early morning temperature and humidity conditions at MaMeeFarm, recorded on
18 December 2025 at 07:00 AM (GMT+7), prior to the start of daily farm activities.

The image shows a digital temperature and humidity meter mounted against a brick wall, displaying an ambient temperature of 18.5°C and relative humidity of 78%.

This reading represents baseline environmental conditions before physical labor begins, providing contextual data for interpreting animal behavior, human work capacity, and daily farm operations.

The measurement is recorded under natural conditions, without artificial climate control, reflecting real-world environmental exposure at the farm site.

This record is captured as-is, without adjustment or enhancement, in accordance with DGCP principles of ground-truth data, temporal accuracy, and transparency.
The embedded timestamp in the image provides verifiable temporal evidence and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily proof archive.

This proof is part of the official DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea and is distributed via IPFS (ipfs.io) for immutable reference.
